question: I heard one of the Sahabiyya did not get her menses?
answer:
QUESTION

it was said that one of the sahabies did not get their menses? can you provide me with the names?

also

is there any wazeefa to read  to stop excessive bleeding (menses). it continues for more the required number fo days.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

1. We were unable to establish this.

2. Why don’t you seek medical attention as well? There are remedies available for this. Also, continue making dua for this. 

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
